reviewText: What a beautiful film. I love the visuals and the story is fast paced and interesting. It's amazing to see such high end effects in a short film, and I think this should be a feature.

The Sphere is a visual masterpiece that took months to create. It's a short film that takes you through space in a dramatic adventure that nearly ends humanity. When a three-dimensional digital creation comes to life, the sphere falls to earth with mind-blowing speed, and the anti-gravity emitter is created in a flash to handle the potential destruction. This is a must see short film as all the visual effects were created in an at home studio and would typically cost hundreds of thousands of dollars. Pretty cool!
